entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Don't give a diagnostic for inability to convert to an error type #69138
    Compiler.Next
  • LSIF generator can sometimes write non-LSIF to stdout #69137
  • Report diagnostic for collection expression with collection initializer target type where Add() returns a value #69136
  • [SUGGESTION] Add refactorings: extract interface and implement interface #69135
  • [BUG] c# dev kit - high memory usage #69134
  • Error when using collection-expression for an array-typed attribute argument. #69133
    17.8
  • Analyzer/Fixer to convert existing code to collection expressions. #69132
  • Unexpected CS1573 with XML docs that are already inherited #69126
  • Cannot paste tabs into editor anymore #69124
  • Dotnet build uses old version of a source generator dll during build #69123

Closed

  • Inconsistent behavior of CS0219 and IDE0059 #69129
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.LanguageServer is not reporting capabilities according to lsp-spec. #68849
  • Surface a warning at the declaration site for members that will be hidden by the language `[InlineArray]` support #68868
    C# 12.0
  • Correct way to rename a file in a code fix #6261
    Backlog
  • Renaming a document? #69125

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable bootstrapped builds #69130
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement extension indexer access #69122
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localize the output of run tests #69121
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix dotnet test SDK resolution when server starts as dll #69120
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disable test codelens when devkit is enabled #69119
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add test for Experimental usage in Experimental method #69131
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged, Next
  • Improve EnC analysis to handle active statements in primary constructors #69028
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • LSP: add empty commands array to ServerCapabilites.ExecuteCommandProvider #69128
    Community, Next
  • Implement `IsMoveableVariable` check for inline array element access. #69098
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays, Next
  • Rename collection literals to collection expressions #69114
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Warn that a user-defined API on an inline array type won’t be used by the language for an element access expression #69064
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays, Next
  • Add support for IDE scenarios related to `ref readonly` parameters #69085
    Area-IDE, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0

Updated

  • Collection literals: collection builder methods #68930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove tracking link to issue 44902 #69095
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid binding lambdas unnecessarily in some error scenarios #59733
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Initial support for a set of analyzers/fixers to update existing code to use collection expressions. #69118
    Area-Analyzers, Story, untriaged
  • Require `SizeConst` for `UnmanagedType.ByValArray` #68992
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Source generators/track values etw #68830
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Add fuzzer for incremental generators #68903
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Lazily calculate preview operations #68214
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Suppress `ref readonly` warning for extension method receiver #69083
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8
  • Relax method conversions with ref readonly parameters #69020
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Allow parsing `ref readonly` parameters in `cref` #69104
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.8
  • Update ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 7.2.1.6856 (#67875) #69065
